thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express New York - Manhattan West Side - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Night before the cruise
thread.title_full: Night before the cruise - Review of Holiday Inn Express New York - Manhattan West Side, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kathleenvolk
title: Night before the cruise
text:
This was the perfect location for our family that was about to go on a cruise the next day.
We had a little extra time for a bus tour. Josie, our attendant, who was genuinely sweet
and helpful, hooked us up to a bus tour with a discount. She also made us feel
welcomed and comfortable. Thanks Josei!
The small rooms were clean and beds comfortable.
